item.title: covid19
item.description: # NYC: \(R_{0}\) We are after the Reproductive number \(R_{0}\) for NYC. We want good reliable estimates given the available data. First a quick reminder of SIR model. The SIR epidemic model assumes a fix number \(N\) of individuals are (at each time \(t\)) divided into three groups \((S,I,R)\) thus its name. Where \(S=S(t)\) are the Susceptible individuals that are able to catch the virus, \(I=I(t)\) are the Infectives able to transmit the virus, and \(R=R(t)\) are the Removed individuals that either died or become immune to the virus.
